Title: Provides that every schedule of rates of gas and electric corporations which is based on operation of over 18 months, shall be reviewed annually
Summary: Provides that every gas or electric rate schedule, which is based on projections of revenues, expenditures and utility operations for more than 18 months, shall be annually reviewed by the public service commission; such review proceeding shall include all the parties involved in the proceeding at which such schedule was originally approved.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring annual reviews of multi-year rate plans
